name: Pokefish: Gotta flash em' all !
description:
Story

Captain Nemo left you in charge of the mighty Nautilus and sent you on a scientific exploration mission.  
He gave you some strange journal called Pokefishdex to complete before you return. While crossing the Indian ocean you come by the entrance of a huge pit topped by a coral reef.  
You feel that this place is rich with wildlife and decide to dive down and explore !

The Game

Pokefish is a chill exploration game where your goal is to uncover the mysteries of the deep sea.  
You pilot the Nautilus and try to take pictures of all the different species that crowd this strange pit that you discovered during your journey.

Controls

- Arrows     :             movement

- Return     :             take picture

- Mouse      :             target your flashlight

- Left click :             fire a light probe (if available)

Devlog

1.2 : fixed bugs on game end and screen size should be ok for everyone now
